attributes.action: Override EU referendum "Brexit" – England to rejoin the EU with immediate effect

attributes.background: 1m reasons, incl: PEACE IN OUR TIME; Brexit causing financial & constitutional meltdown; UK going from successful, multicultural, multinational, tolerant financial & legal hub to racist, isolationist backwater; losing the ECHR – WHICH WE WROTE; massive job losses; no free movement of labour.
